name: Earthventure
description: Earthventure is a puzzle-slash-adventure game with real-world applicability. In Earthventure, you play as Mother Earth. Her children - the Ocean, Air, and Forest - are falling ill from human pollution, and Mother Earth is the only one who can save them! In her quest for her precious children, she solves hazardous mazes, defeats waste enemies, and cleans environmental pollutants.
